content: The Earth Rakshasa's Spirit allows you to take the form of the creature and charge forward before smashing its giant shield into the ground, creating a barrier between you and your enemies. This not only damages foes but also creates a blockade, protecting you from enemy attacks while the shield remains. This can be an excellent way to block yourself from your enemy for a moment to take a sip from your Gourd or take some Medicine in relative safety.
promot:

The content is as follows:
The Earth Rakshasa's Spirit allows you to take the form of the creature and charge forward before smashing its giant shield into the ground, creating a barrier between you and your enemies. This not only damages foes but also creates a blockade, protecting you from enemy attacks while the shield remains. This can be an excellent way to block yourself from your enemy for a moment to take a sip from your Gourd or take some Medicine in relative safety.
